title: MarineScope (Smart India Hackathon)
shortDescription: Unified backend platform for scattered marine research data.
problem: Marine research data (oceanographic, fisheries, genomic) exists in isolated systems, making analysis, accessibility, and decision-making inefficient for researchers and policymakers.
approach: Designed a centralized Spring Boot backend with REST APIs to integrate heterogeneous datasets. Structured data flow to support scalable access for analytics and ML model consumption.

title: ColorSense
shortDescription: Dynamic outfit recommendation engine adapting to weather context.
problem: Standard outfit recommendations are static, ignoring real-time environmental factors like weather and user context.
approach: Developed backend logic integrating live Weather API and ML model outputs. Designed the service flow to deliver context-aware suggestions based on real-time conditions.
